text: Sally Menke (December 17, 1953 â€“ September 27, 2010) was an American movie and television editor. She was editor for all Quentin Tarantino movies before her death. She also edited documentaries for CBS. She was born in Mineola, New York. She died from heat stress in Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:American movie producers Category:People from New York (state) Category:1953 births Category:2010 deaths Category:American editors
title: Sally Menke
